How do identity rewards on the Verus network lead to inflation of the currency?

Actually, identity rewards on the Verus network do not lead to inflation of the currency. According to the text, these rewards "will not inflate the currency". The rewards are designed to provide a new source of income for participants without increasing the money supply, which would lead to inflation.
